DOC.brief_summary: The primary focus proposal address grow concern overweight/ obese adolescent hyperlipidemia . The propose study 2-arm randomize controlled clinical trial compare effectiveness Motivational interviewing ( MI ) intervention parent adolescent dyad versus adolescent ( 10-17yr ) alone . The patient recruit Lipid clinic Sick Kids . The study hypothesis parent child dyad success due possible synergetic effect compare adolescent alone . The study 's primary outcome cholesterol level ( Triglycerides/HDL ratio ) secondary outcome include overall improvement lifestyle response MI intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Motivational Interviewing With Dyslipidemic Adolescents Together With Parent Versus With Adolescents Alone : A Mixed Methods Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: Age randomization : 1017 year old 12 hour fast lipid profile triglyceride ≥39 mg/dL ( 1.0 mmol/L ) HDLC ≤46 mg/dL ( 1.2 mmol/L ) , nonHDLC ≥123 mg/dL ( 3.2 mmol/L ) Waist height ratio ≥0.5 . On lipid lower medication nonEnglish speaking Developmentally delay
